mapper.select:
SELECT rno, no, parent_no, depth, seq, insert_date, edit_date, content, name, trash
FROM
infomation_reply
WHERE
no = #{num1Int}
AND
trash = 1
ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(parent_no), rno, parent_no), seq;

SELECT
count(*)
FROM
infomation_reply
WHERE
rno = #{num1Int}
AND
trash = 1;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO
infomation_reply
( no, parent_no, depth, seq, insert_date, edit_date, content, name, trash )
VALUES
( #{no}, #{parent_no}, #{depth}, #{seq}, NOW(), NULL, #{content}, #{name}, 1 );
mapper.update:
UPDATE
infomation_reply
SET
edit_date = #{edit_date}, content = #{content},
WHERE
rno = #{rno}

UPDATE
infomation_reply
SET
trash = 0
WHERE
rno = #{num1Int};
